text: Hi developers! week ago our team connected emails to our domain. It was a recommendation from HubSpot. We have two emails no-reply and support. and now, when sending a letter from support@...com, for some reason in the mailbox the email support@...com has the name no-reply.  (No-Reply instead of Support). What do you think the problem might be and how can it be solved? (the name was correct before this connection )

Hello people,
I'm sending transactional email as part of a deal workflow, but it seems these sent emails don't get associated to the contact or the deal. Do I need to create an activity and associate it with the relevant records?
(This seemed like a better place to ask than <#C2YHAHB6K|api>)
